description._content: Description: The building on the left is Marshal Bertrand's house. This picture shews some of the unsightly sheds and one of the pits, which are clearly visible from the porch of Longwood Old House. Location: St Helena Date: 1933 Our Catalogue Reference: Part of CO 1069/762 This image is part of the Colonial Office photographic collection held at The National Archives. Feel free to share it within the spirit of the Commons Please use the comments section below the pictures to share any information you have about the people, places or events shown. We have attempted to provide place information for the images automatically but our software may not have found the correct location. For high quality reproductions of any item from our collection please contact our image library
